result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nicholas Jerome Beach

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Filed by Atty Harrelson. Re: agreement on case. km

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot,ADA:  Sharon Correll   DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Nicholas Jerome Beach appeared. Includes 14CF322, 14CF420, 14CF443. Case called at 3:20 pm. ADA Correll makes recommendations. No objection from Atty Harrelson.   Court reviews constitutional rights with def. Court finds Def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. Court reads charge and possible penalties for count one and two in 14CF322 and Count 3 in 14CF443, def pleads Guilty. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates Def guilty of Count 1 and Count 2 on 14CF322 and Guilty of Count 3 in 14CF443. Counts 1 and 2 in 14CF443 are dismissed but read in for purposes of restitution. 14CF420 is also dismissed and read in for purposes of restitution. Sentencing arguements. Court orders:
On Count 1 in 14CF322 - 3 years Probation W/H
- Court Costs
- Restition to be held open for 60 Days
- Jail 120 Days STAYED
- AODA and follow through
- Psychological/Psychiatric Evaluation if requested by Agent
- Cooperate with any program as directed by Agent
- DNA Sample and surcharge on Count 1 in 14CF322
- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
- Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol.
- Not to possess a firearm
- Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid license
- Restortive Justice
- Maintain Employment
- Random UA's and PBT's
- No contact with K. Mccarthy or L. Robl
- Follow all rules and regulations of Agent
- Pay supervision fees
To sign up for probation by 3:00 pm on 3/2/2015
90 credit against ultimate sentence

Count 2 in 14CF322
2 years probation

On 14CF443, Count #3
2 years probation

Probation to run concurrent
  Probation review hearing scheduled for April 13, 2015 at 04:45 pm.
Filed by K. Mccarthy. Re: no contact order. km Per EFV, will take up on 2-27-15. hml

TO ALSO INCLUDE 14CF322, 14CF420 and 14CF443
CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Liddle DA:   Eric Gordon Johnson   DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Nicholas Jerome Beach appeared from jail. Case called at 3:15 p.m. Court reviews file. Atty Harrelson states $750 posted in 14CF322 and no cash posted on the other 2 files. Been in custody since late September. Atty Harrelson has spoke to mother and will be co-signer on bond and could reside with her. Asking for signature bond with co-signer. DA in objection to that request. Bond $1250 cash on all 3 files, co-signed by mom, same conditions, balance $3,750 signature.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 1, 2014 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Nicholas Jerome Beach
Current: 205 W Graham St #3, Roberts, WI 54023 United States  (Effective: 11-11-2014)
Prior: 506 N. 6th Street, North Hudson, WI 54016 United States

TO ALSO INCLUDE 14CF322, 14CF420 and 14CF443:

$750.00 bond on file.

Total bond amount of $5,000. $3,750 signature bond with mother Laura Crimmins to co-sign and $1,250 cash.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Lloyd R.  and Katie M. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

Includes 14CF420, 14CF443 & 14CF322.
CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Liddle. ADA:   Sharon Correll   DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Nicholas Jerome Beach appeared from jail. Case called at 11:28 a.m. Court reviews file. ADA Correll makes statement that defendant plead on Nov. 3rd to EJL case. Not asking for increase in bail. Atty Harrelson states that Mr. Beach has signed up for probation. Atty Harrelson makes statement. 14CF322 $750 cash posted on that case. Cases 14CF420 and 14CF443 no money has been posted. Cash posted on other case being held for restitution. Defendant has been incarcerated since 09-26 or 09-28-2014. Going to reside with mother in Roberts upon release. Being held on a bond which he can not pay. Court recesses at 11:34 a.m. Court resumes at 11:43 a.m. Court speaks to defendant. Would like to meet mother. Also wants update from probation agent. Set for next week. hml  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for November 11, 2014 at 03:45 pm.
and Motion for Review of Bail Bond. Filed by Atty Harrelson. Hearing set. km

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Fox, ADA: Kenneth N. Sortedahl, DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski, DF:  Nicholas Jerome Beach appeared from jail. Includes 14CF148, 14CF322, 14CF420 and 14CF443. There is an agreement on file 14CF148. Court reviews constitutional rights with def. Court finds def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. Court reads charge and possible penalties for count 3 in 14CF148. Def pleads no contest. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates def guilty of count 3. Court dismisses counts 1 & 2.  Court orders 

S/W - 1 year probation (Count 3 on 14CF148) with conditions:
- Restitution, to be determined within 30 days and payable through probation. 
- Court costs $243.00; payable through probation.
- Follow all rules and regulations of probation. 
Defendant advised of right to appeal. 
Sign up for probation 11/4/14.

Court directs remaining files to be sent for scheduling in Branch 2.
Bond continues on 14CF322, 14CF420 & 14CF443.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Fox, ADA:  Matthew Hartung for Sortedahl, DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski and Jeremiah Harrelson, DF:  Nicholas Jerome Beach appeared, in custody. Includes 14CF148, 14CF322, 14CF420 and 14CF443. A new date is requested. Court sets and bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 3, 2014 at 04:00 pm.
Filed by Atty Harrelson. Re: transfer of cases to EJL. Reviewed by EFV. km
